divs: Sighting DetailsDuring walk on govt road pahoa Hawaii near Hawaiian beaches took a picture of sunrise. Note moon was setting behind me. Notice after picture cylinder object above sunrise. Next day again took picture and again noticed object. It had moved Same about 12 times. Noticed it on 20 may again. Object had changed positions but was still hovering. Sent in picture to channel 2 news, told it was the moon. You can see the object in front of clouds. Picture delegated from there files I'm a retired Air Force pilot. This is not the moon or a weather ballon
Summary: Cylinder shows up in pictures. At least 12 times. Can not see it as its in or near sunrise
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Pāhoa
There were no other sightings in Pāhoa on or around March 3rd 2013
This sighting has never been favorited.
